scripts.build: cross-env SKIP_ENV_VALIDATION=true TSC_COMPILE_ON_ERROR=true DISABLE_ESLINT=true next build
scripts.build:liara: cross-env SKIP_ENV_VALIDATION=true TSC_COMPILE_ON_ERROR=true DISABLE_ESLINT=true SKIP_TYPE_CHECK=true ESLint_NO_DEV_ERRORS=true next build
scripts.build:force: cross-env SKIP_ENV_VALIDATION=true TSC_COMPILE_ON_ERROR=true DISABLE_ESLINT=true SKIP_TYPE_CHECK=true ESLint_NO_DEV_ERRORS=true ESLINT_NO_DEV_ERRORS=true next build --no-lint
